name: Truck Driver Cargo Master 2018
description:
Truck Driver Cargo Master 2018!!!
Get ready to play a most realistic truck free game. You can enjoy cargo simulation and crazy stunts on same time Truck simulation hill driving is a brand new story game.
Features.
Easy and realistic truck driving control.
impossible road tracks with addictive control and game play.
Good use of physics to simulate your truck driving skills.
Heavy cargo truck with customization in color and control.
Drive in various weather conditions and rain storm effects.
